pic1_alt: Hex logo of LondonMarathon R package. Background of the hex is an aerial photo of the Thames River and downtown London, and LondonMarathon is written on it, overlaid in red font.
pic2_alt: Horizontal bar chart of the nationality of London Marathon winner, created by Nicola Rennie. Highest number of wins is at the top, and lowest is at the bottom. These are the nations and their number of winners. United Kingdom 44, Kenya 30, United States 11, Switzerland 10, Ethiopia 9, Norway 7, Iceland 6, Mexico 5, Germany 5, Portugal 4, Italy 4, Canada 4, Sweden 3, Japan 3, France 3, Denmark 3, Austraila 3, Poland 2, Morocco 2, Spain 1, Soviet Union 1, Netherlands 1, China 1, Belgium 1
